title: Bright & Early: Manic Tuesday Edition
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
Good morning, Nashville. We’re running behind, so you know the drill. Your abbreviated Bright & Early:

  • Sun is in the forecast today! Lots of sun! Hallelujah.  [Nashville WX]
  • If you see a big disturbance and a bunch of flashing emergency lights around the airport today and tomorrow, don’t freak out! They’re just doing their annual live fire training. That said, traffic could be moving a little slower there this week so plan ahead. [WKRN]
  • A bill moving through the legislature could allow folks to pack heat in the workplace. [WKRN]
  • Have you heard? It’s Free Pancake Day at IHOP! For charity, of course. [WKRN]
  • So after you finish stuffing yourself with pancakes, you can read this story about how the YMCA has seen a 22,000-person attendance increase over this time last year. [WKRN]
  • TPAC has opened up a brand new satellite box office at the Green Hills Mall, and they’re offering buy-one-get-one-free tickets to select performances to celebrate. [Out & About]
  • The Regional Transportation Authority saw such a demand for the hour-long bus route from Springfield that they decided to make it permanent. [WPLN]
